org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1
Class ResourceEdgeApi

java.lang.Object
  org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1.ResourceEdgeApi

public class ResourceEdgeApi
extends java.lang.Object

The Hyperic HQ Resource Edge API.

This class provides access to relationships between resources in HQ.
